Description: All Annual Meeting attendees are invited to participate in this special evening session hosted by the AACR Tumor Microenvironment Working Group. The 2022 TME Town Hall will feature three presentations from rising stars in the tumor microenvironment community. The Town Hall also includes a Networking Reception at the beginning and conclusion of the session. Complimentary refreshments will be served.
Location: Grand Ballroom C, Hilton New Orleans Riverside
SearchResultBody: TM08. Tumor Microenvironment Working Group (TME) Town Hall Meeting and Networking Reception
